reviews.text:
We had a wonderful experience with Pool Quest.  The communication was great with our designer, the office staff and our project manager.  You'll enjoy working with Pool Quest's staff - they work hard so you can have the pool of your dreams.

The project started with a timeline outlining each step and what to expect.  Completion time was around 5 weeks.  (Pool plaster is Peerless Pebble - Sky Blue.  It's a beautiful light/medium blue.  The tiles are Aquabella Villanova)

This was our second pool

Review for Pool Quest: Exceptional Service and Expertise, Kevin Strong is a Standout Representative!

After meeting with several large pool companies in the area, we decided to move forward with Pool Quest and we could not be more pleased with our decision! From start to finish, their professionalism and attention to detail exceeded our expectations.

A huge shoutout to Kevin Strong, who was hands down the best representative we worked with. Kevin went above and beyond to ensure that we understo

Pool Quest, hands down THE best company for your new pool build. From the sales staff - Matthew, to scheduling - Gina and Kim- to the project manager, Randy - they have their A-game on point and really put the customer first. Literally took us 5 weeks to go from a hole in our backyard to a beautiful new pool - thank to this team. The staff are so helpful and they def lean on their core values of integrity - they made a minor mistake right, with no battle. They really serve as a true partner in s

Our Pool Quest experience was phenomenal, We met with  Nick and explained what we were wanting and he came up with a great design he even gave us some great suggestions!  Once we agreed on the design and signed the contract we began the process and I was very impressed with how smoothly everything went, and appreciated all of the communication between us, the office and Jeff.  Everyone with Pool Quest who had hands on building our backyard oasis were professional,  and always available for quest

From the moment we met James (Pool-Quest designer) we felt we were in great hands. He introduced and educated us on Pool-Quest, how the company, their process, the number of pools the built (limited to focus on quality, craftsmanship  and accurate scheduling). From there is was on to design.

This was our first pool so we had a lot of questions. With each step of the design James educated us on each component, design options and costs. We had a few 3D rendering and video meetings that incorporat

Highly recommended! Quality and building process was the main reason we choose Pool-Quest.  On excavation day, Walter (Owner), his son, Derick, and the whole crew were triple checking everything. Nicholas and his great design expertise sealed the deal.

From start to finish, the communication was excellent and exceeded our expectations. Derick, Project Manager and a Army Veteran, took care of any issues or concerns we had during the building process.

Our family will enjoy the pool for many many

If you are looking for a trusted, professional Pool Company to build the backyard of your dreams...look no further.

In today's construction world, the word "painful" is a common description when one decides to build a backyard pool.  Pool Quest is the exact opposite.  From the initial project site meeting with a salesperson (Nick is the best, ask for him!), to concept, to project management (Randy & Kim are the best too!), to project quality checks, to completion; this company cares.  There is

After reviewing Pool Quest's credentials and insurance history, we made the decision to hire Pool Quest to build our pool. The process from the design stage, construction and to the very end was extremely professional, pleasant, and built as promised. There were some hiccups along the way which is common when it comes to constructions, but they were on point throughout it all. Even the owner came to evaluate the construction stages and final product. We will definitely hire them again if we ever

Pool Quest built our pool at the end of 2019, I have waited to put this review up to make sure they continued with the great service we received during the process and it has.  Pool quest has been responsive and taken care of us.  Kevin designed our pool, we could not have picked a better person to help us with the design.  He listened and brought our dreams to life.  Derek was the our Project lead, he keep us informed every step of the way and resolved every issue we had.  Both Kevin and Derek

We chose Pool Quest for our backyard renovations, including gutting a 20+ year old pool, landscaping, drainage, re-pouring all new concrete, and new equipment.  Overall, they were top notch to deal with.  Ethan and Walter came out from Ft. Worth to Dallas to evaluate our situation, had a professional design ready in 2 weeks, and sent us a YouTube video of the design.

They were professional, and Randy (on-site) was regularly at our house, and stayed in constant communication with us.  The job to

Our pool journey started right before Covid hit in 2020. Kevin Strong designed the perfect pool for us at the time. But then with the world in such uncertainty, we decided to wait. Fat forward to 2022. We went in again to see Kevin. Talked about the pool and tweaked the design.  Again, we decided to wait. When 2023 came around, we pulled the bandaid off. Kevin was so gracious when we asked for a completely different design.  Now we were ready. From Kevin, Randy, Geoff, Walter, Ethan, Gina, Kim a
Professional sales staff! Wonderful owner. They finished constructing our pool in 6 weeks. Quality pool construction! HIGHLY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED !

Nicholas McDaniel created an awesome design for our freeform pool.  He  listened to our requests and maximized the space in our backyard.  Derek Shires was the project manager and kept us in the know at all times.  He was very knowledgeable and there were very few delays.  He made sure the pool was exactly to specs.  The pool looks amazing!  I would definitely recommend Pool Quest.

We would like to thank Pool Quest Designer Kevin Strong, for his patience and professionalism on making our dream pool possible. Also for providing great costumer service and we appreciate the follow up calls after our pool was  completed.
Great experience from beginning to end! Custom designed my outdoor patio. Covered patio with cedar, stained concrete, and fire pit. Amazing 10/10 would recommend!

We used Pool Quest for our new pool. We met with 4-5 different pool companies and received different designs and quotes. Pool Quest was not the cheapest, but we definitely feel like we have a superior pool because of them.

Pool Quest is amazing!  They provide first class customer service. You can tell the team really cares about your project and wants to help make your dream backyard a reality.  They also provide you with professional pictures and video as a keepsake.  Thank you so much!

"I had an amazing experience working with Pool Quest! From start to finish, their communication was excellent, kept me in the loop throughout every phase of the project.
The quality of work was outstanding, and it's clear they have a deep knowledge and expertise in the field. The structural engineer ensured everything was built to perfection. The office staff were above excellent, always responsive and helpful. The superintendent was a real asset to the team, making sure everything ran smoothly.

I recently had the pleasure of working with Pool Quest to build a pool in my backyard, and I cannot recommend them highly enough. From start to finish, the entire process was professional, efficient, and stress-free.

First and foremost, the quality of the work was outstanding. The team at Pool Quest clearly takes pride in their craft and made sure that every detail was perfect. The pool itself is beautiful and exactly what I had envisioned. The materials used were top-notch and I can tell that

I recently had the pleasure of working with Pool-Quest to transform my backyard into the oasis of my dreams, and I couldn't be happier with the results. From start to finish, the team at Pool-Quest was professional, knowledgeable, and dedicated to making my vision a reality.
